===================
FireWorks Changelog
===================

v0.12
=====

.. warning:: The ``get_fw_id`` and ``get_fw`` LaunchPad commands were merged into ``get_fws``.

* better support for getting states of FireWorks and Workflows
* minor bugfix for dynamic FireWorks

v0.11
=====

* rerunning FireWorks
* misc fixes for categories

v0.1
====

* initial Release
